dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially. North oriented to upper left. Includes a decorative title cartouche with two faces, the French coat of arms, compass rose. Incription reads "A Amsterdam chez Iosse Hondius, et se vend a Paris chez Melchoir Tavernier, demeurant aupres du Palais. a. 1623." [Printed] in Amsterdam at the store of Jodocus Hondius and sold in Paris at the store of Melchoir Tavernier, located near the Palace. Year 1623." From "Atlantis maioris appendix", Johannes Janssonius, 1630. 1 map 35 x 48 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Jansson, Jan, 1588-1664.,Vignaud, Henry, 1830-1922, former owner.,Hondius, Jodocus, 1563-1612, cartographer.,Jansson, Jan, 1588-1664. Atlantis Maioris Appendix, 1630.
